metadata.title: CVE-2015-8669 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: libraries/config/messages.inc.php in phpMyAdmin 4.0.x before 4.0.10.12,4.4.x before 4.4.15.2, and 4.5.x before 4.5.3.1 allows remote attackers toobtain sensitive information via a crafted request, which reveals the fullpath in an error message.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in trusty is affected and needs fixing.
